tests.title: loads the dashboard page
has navigation elements
displays a proper layout structure
tests.fullTitle: Dashboard displays a proper layout structure

tests.title: shows statistics or metrics
tests.code:
// Look for numbers which are likely metrics
cy.get('div').contains(/\d+/).should('exist');

tests.title: has interactive elements
tests.code:
// Look for any buttons or links
cy.get('button, a').should('exist');

tests.title: displays meaningful content
tests.code:
// The page should have some text content
cy.get('div').invoke('text').should('have.length.greaterThan', 100);

tests.title: displays the upcoming campaigns card
tests.fullTitle: Dashboard displays the upcoming campaigns card

err.message: AssertionError: Timed out retrying after 10000ms: Expected to find content: 'Upcoming Campaigns' but never did.
err.estack:
AssertionError: Timed out retrying after 10000ms: Expected to find content: 'Upcoming Campaigns' but never did.
    at Context.eval (webpack://my-project/./config/cypress/e2e/layout/dashboard.cy.js:56:38)
